post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Senior Systems Developer/Team Leader (Unix)

  As one of the fastest growing recruiting and consulting companies, we are excited to bring another opportunity to individuals looking for change and new challenges in the IT marketplace. We have consistently delivered the best contract and permanent opportunities to candidates worldwide through strong relationships with our clients. We promise to bring together the best candidates for the most exciting opportunities that the market has to offer.

- Placing People Point-to-Point –

Senior Systems Developer/Team Leader (Unix)


Located in downtown Toronto, this financial institution is a leader in the global custody and corporate trust business.

This client has an immediate need fort the following:


· Responsible for leading team in SAS/web and web technologies also migrating applications from MVS to UNIX
· Strong/expert knowledge of SAS (esp. in SAS web products)
· Medium knowledge of web technologies
· Minimum 10 years programming experience
· UNIX and PC environment
· Application support/new development

Note:
*****
Only Candidates with working experience will be contacted

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
careers@planitsearch.com
PlanIT Search
post.title: Senior Systems Developer/Team Leader (Unix)
